wikipedia_page.main: Peter James Scott Lumsden, CBE (20 February 1929 – 15 October 2017) was a British motorsport competitor who gained renown between 1959 and 1965 racing at Le Mans, the Nürburgring, Silverstone & Goodwood before twice winning at Brands Hatch in his final season in 1965. He is the younger son of Lieutenant-General Herbert Lumsden and brother of Michael.
